thread.title: Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm
thread.title_full: Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm

author: Ted McInerney
title: Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm
text: Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm Mountains expected to get pounded with heavy snow while the coast mixes with sleet and rain late Advertisement Winter Storm Warning issued in Maine ahead of a spring snowstorm Mountains expected to get pounded with heavy snow while the coast mixes with sleet and rain late Winter Storm Warning goes into effect at 2 a.m. on Saturday and runs through 6 a.m. Sunday. Areas in the warning could receive between 12 and 18 inches of snow in the mountains and 8-12 inches in the foothills.With the potential for heavy rainfall, some excessive rainfall could lead to flash flooding.The storm system wraps up overnight Saturday into Sunday. Sunday looks much better for Maine Maple Sunday. , Maine â€” Winter Storm Warning goes into effect at 2 a.m. on Saturday and runs through 6 a.m. Sunday. Areas in the warning could receive between 12 and 18 inches of snow in the mountains and 8-12 inches in the foothills. Advertisement With the potential for heavy rainfall, some excessive rainfall could lead to flash flooding. The storm system wraps up overnight Saturday into Sunday. Sunday looks much better for Maine Maple Sunday.
